item.title: Need Help Removing LVL XP PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @xRYUx xRYUx
item.description:
@xRYUx wrote:

I made the exp too high and now the xp is * and my combat lvl is 0…

Here is the code I used in client.java

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxlvls") && playerRights >= 3) { addSkillXP(99999999, 0); addSkillXP(99999999, 1); addSkillXP(99999999, 2); addSkillXP(99999999, 3); addSkillXP(99999999, 4); addSkillXP(99999999, 5); addSkillXP(99999999, 6); addSkillXP(99999999, 7); addSkillXP(99999999, 8); addSkillXP(99999999, 9); addSkillXP(99999999, 10); addSkillXP(99999999, 11); addSkillXP(99999999, 12); addSkillXP(99999999, 13); addSkillXP(99999999, 14); addSkillXP(99999999, 15); addSkillXP(99999999, 16); addSkillXP(99999999, 17); addSkillXP(99999999, 18); addSkillXP(99999999, 19); addSkillXP(99999999, 20); addSkillXP(99999999, 21); addSkillXP(99999999, 22); addSkillXP(99999999, 23); addSkillXP(99999999, 24); }
I used that cept I had 1 more 9. Please help!!!

Thanks
-Ryu[br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 04:29:42 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE!!! Someone help me!!! My lvls go down!!! Is there a remove exp command like removeskillxp???

Read full topic
